attributes.action: ban tesco from forcing people to buy four cans of beer at a time rather than one as this is making people drink more not less.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently Tesco store ruled that they would only sell their beer, lager etc in four packs. Customers cannot buy one or two cans. I believe this encourages them to binge drink. Someone may just want two cans but if they have to buy four they are more likely to drink four.

rejection.details: Please contact Tesco directly in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
